text: John Katsilometes is an American entertainment columnist in Las Vegas, Nevada. He writes the "Kats!" column for the Las Vegas Review-Journal. Katsilometes was the Nevada Press Association’s journalist of the year in 2013 and has also won Best of the West and EPPY journalism awards. == Background == Katsilometes was initially hired as a sportswriter at the Review-Journal in 1996. In 1998, he joined Greenspun Media Group and began writing a social column, The Kats Report, for the Las Vegas Sun. In 2016, Katsilometes returned to the Review- Journal in the place of longtime gossip columnist Norm Clarke. His column covering celebrities, city nightlife, and divas runs daily on page 3A. Katsilometes hosts a weekly radio show on KUNV-FM. He also appears Wednesdays on KTNV Channel 13's midday show. Katsilometes was the first to announce the death of "Lifestyles of the Rich and Famous" host Robin Leach, who was a fellow columnist at the Review-Journal, on Twitter. == References == Category:21st-century American journalists Category:American columnists Category:American male journalists Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Journalists from Nevada Category:20th- century American journalists Category:20th-century American male writers Category:21st-century American male writers
